# unsafeArgv

**Type Property**

Access to the raw argv value from C.

## Declaration

```swift
static var unsafeArgv: UnsafeMutablePointer<UnsafeMutablePointer<Int8>?> { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is a `nil`-terminated C array. Including the trailing `nil`, there are [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Swift/CommandLine/argc] `+ 1` elements in the array.



## Accessing Raw Argument Data

- **argc**: Access to the raw argc value from C.
